solution_line_template: In one minute the company produces {chocolate_bars_per_minute} chocolate bars, which means they use {chocolate_bars_per_minute} * {sugar_per_bar} = <<{chocolate_bars_per_minute}*{sugar_per_bar}={sugar_per_minute}>>{sugar_per_minute} grams of sugar.

So in {minutes_to_calculate} minutes, the company uses {sugar_per_minute} * {minutes_to_calculate} = <<{sugar_per_minute}*{minutes_to_calculate}={total_sugar_used}>>{total_sugar_used} grams of sugar to produce chocolate bars.
